rreval
Class ConduitClientSide

java.lang.Object
  rreval.MessageWrangler
      rreval.ConduitClientSide

public class ConduitClientSide
extends MessageWrangler

Sends messages from the rreval client to an rreval server and returns the reply. Because every message gets a reply, this class is client side specific.
